name: Hexocraft
description:
A prototype for a hex-based creative building game. The idea for the game it to allow player to edit blocks on the fly instead of having to have lots of different items in their inventory.

This prototype is not a finished game. It demonstrates the basic principals behind the idea, allowing player to build anything they want and edit blocks with no restrictions. 

GitHub repository: https://github.com/IllyaHlushko/Hexocraft_Prototype
